name: Pub/Sub Lite to Clous Storage
description: An Apache Beam streaming pipeline that reads messages from Pub/Sub Lite, applies fixed windowing on the messages, and writes the results to files on Cloud Storage.

parameters.name: subscription
parameters.label: Pub/Sub Lite subscription
parameters.helpText: Pub/Sub subscription to read from, e.g. projects/my-project/locations/us-central1-b/subscriptions/my-subscription.

parameters.name: windowSize
parameters.label: Window size in minutes
parameters.helpText: Window size of output files in minutes.

parameters.name: output
parameters.label: Filename prefix of output files including the file path
parameters.helpText: Filename prefix of output files including the file path, e.g. gs://my-bucket/my-filename-prefix.
